result.purpose: Handles various HTTP requests related to proxy services, including activities, AI processing, balance management, configuration retrieval, DApp interactions, fiat token pricing, profile checks, RPC requests, simulation, and token management.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, where each file corresponds to a specific domain of functionality within the proxy service, promoting separation of concerns and maintainability.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/activity.purpose: Handles activity-related HTTP requests for a proxy service.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/ai.go.purpose: Handles AI-related requests for processing chat functions in a web service.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/balance..purpose: Handles balance-related API endpoints for portfolio and NFT collections.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/config.g.purpose: Handles configuration retrieval for blockchain chains in a proxy service.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/dapp.go.purpose: Handles DApp-related HTTP requests for scanning, retrieving, and deleting DApps.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/fiat.go.purpose: Handles fiat token price requests and responses.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/profile..purpose: Handles profile-related HTTP requests for checking profile existence.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/rpc.go.purpose: Handles RPC requests for a specific blockchain chain.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/simulate.purpose: Handles simulation requests via a JSON-RPC endpoint.

internal/domains/proxy/handlers/token.go.purpose: Handles token-related HTTP requests for a proxy service.
